parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter results using OData syntax.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order results by one or more fields.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Project specific fields from the response.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related navigation properties.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Limit the number of returned entities.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Skip the specified number of entities.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Include the total count of matching entities.

parameters.name: $search
parameters.description: Search across text fields where supported.
